objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a smooth industrial grey finish and subtle non-slip texture, defining the base of the booth area. It has precise beveled edges and a slight matte sheen for a clean, modern presentation.

A tall vertical wall panel in smooth white, standing three meters high and nine meters wide, forming the rear boundary of the booth. It has a seamless finish with hidden joint lines and a subtle satin paint texture.
A sleek side wall in bright white, six meters long and three meters tall, with a clean matte finish and minimalistic lines, enclosing the left side of the booth.
A sleek side wall in bright white, six meters long and three meters tall, with a clean matte finish and minimalistic lines, enclosing the right side of the booth.

A front wall panel in pristine white featuring a central entrance opening. The wall spans nine meters wide and three meters high, with a two-meter wide unframed doorway, maintaining a smooth surface and subtle satin finish.

A sleek modern sedan with aerodynamic contours, high-gloss metallic paint finish, tinted windows, and detailed accents. The model features realistic wheel rims, side mirrors, headlights, and a detailed interior visible through the glass.

A modern reception desk with a tempered glass countertop and warm wood veneer front panels. It features integrated LED underlighting, cable management cutouts, and a brushed metal base for a professional, inviting appearance.

A vertical display stand with three clear acrylic shelves mounted on a slim brushed aluminum frame. Integrated LED strip lighting highlights brochures and product samples, creating a refined presentation of promotional materials.

A vertical display stand with three clear acrylic shelves mounted on a slim brushed aluminum frame. Integrated LED strip lighting highlights brochures and product samples, creating a refined presentation of promotional materials.
A minimalist round table with a crisp white laminate top and slender polished steel legs. The tabletop features a subtle beveled edge and a matte finish suitable for casual visitor discussions.
A modern visitor chair with a contoured molded plastic seat in charcoal grey and powder-coated metal legs. The design is ergonomic, stackable, and features a smooth matte finish.
A modern visitor chair with a contoured molded plastic seat in charcoal grey and powder-coated metal legs. The design is ergonomic, stackable, and features a smooth matte finish.
A modern visitor chair with a contoured molded plastic seat in charcoal grey and powder-coated metal legs. The design is ergonomic, stackable, and features a smooth matte finish.
A modern visitor chair with a contoured molded plastic seat in charcoal grey and powder-coated metal legs. The design is ergonomic, stackable, and features a smooth matte finish.

A large rectangular hanging banner made of glossy vinyl, featuring a high-resolution car brand logo and promotional tagline. It has reinforced stitched edges and stainless steel grommets for secure ceiling suspension.

A large rectangular hanging banner made of glossy vinyl, featuring a high-resolution car brand logo and promotional tagline. It has reinforced stitched edges and stainless steel grommets for secure ceiling suspension.

An adjustable LED spotlight with a cylindrical aluminum housing and integrated cooling fins. It casts a focused beam directly downward onto the demo car, with a crisp white light and an articulating mounting bracket.
A tall potted plant with lush broad green leaves in an organic, free-form arrangement. It sits in a modern matte ceramic pot with a tapered profile for a refined decorative accent.
A tall potted plant with lush broad green leaves in an organic, free-form arrangement. It sits in a modern matte ceramic pot with a tapered profile for a refined decorative accent.
